text: Lots of trolls, not just O'Keefe, will take advantage of the #metoo movement. On the net you can't tell who's pulling the strings. It could be an abused woman, or it could be a political cause or Russian oligarchs. America has an exposed surface that's vulnerable to trolling. Gender is a huge wedge, and people who play on divisions will use this, are using this this, to reduce us, to get us to hurt ourselves. Keep your eyes and ears, and most important, your mind, open.
